flawed_nl_solution:
The rancher would have sold his cattle for $204000/340 = $<<204000/340=600.0>>600.0 per head.
He was left with a remainder of 340 - 172 = <<340-172=168>>168 head of cattle.
The lowered price is $600.0 - $150 = $<<600.0-150=540.0>>540.0 per head.
He would make $540.0 x 168 = $<<540.0*168=90720.0>>90720.0 at the lowered price.
He could have made $600.0 x 168 = $<<600.0*168=100800.0>>100800.0 at the original price.
He would lose $100800.0 - $90720.0 = $<<100800.0-90720.0=10080.0>>10080.0

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 450.0, not 540.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
